description: Upgrade to Fender System Wharf 2, Remplacement of Fender System Wharf 11
full_summary:
### Tender Title
#### English: EES19-240460 - Upgrade to Fender System Wharf 2, Removal of Fender System Wharf 11
#### French: EE519-240460 - Mise à niveau du système de défense Quai 2, Remplacement du système de défense Quai 11

### Tender Information
* **Reference Number:** WS4087436288-Doc4092463186
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4087436288
* **Publication Date:** July 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 10, 2023, 14:00:00

### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the upgrade to the fender system at Wharf 2 and the removal of the fender system at Wharf 11. 

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** August 30, 2024
* **UNSPSC Code:** 72141200 - Marine Construction Services

### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Roy-Lippe, Maude (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16837318?extsite=MTY4MzczMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
